content: Paying tributes to the martyrs, Mr. Sinha expressed gratitude to their families. ‚ÄúThe entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with the families to ensure they live a life of comfort and dignity,‚Äù the J&K L-G said

title: Goa nightclub fire: The party that took a tragic turn
content: On December 6, a fire claimed 25 lives during a party at Birch by Romeo Lane, an establishment in Arpora in Goa. The restaurant-cum-club was built on a salt pan and had only a narrow entrance and exit, survivors and activists allege. Rishikesh Bahadur Desai reports on the night‚Äôs happenings and the worries of Goans about unregulated real-estate development, marked by illegal construction, lax fire safety, and poor crowd control

title: Need to take development to Maoist-affected areas, says CM Sai
content: In the past two years, 505 Naxalites have been neutralised, 2,386 have surrendered, and 1,901 have been arrested, says Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Vishnu Deo Sai

title: Very optimistic: India on possibility of sealing trade deal with Oman during PM Modi's visit
content: We have here immense faith that this agreement, if signed during this visit, will significantly deepen the economic ties between India and Oman, says Arun Chatterjee, a Secretary in the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA)

title: Congress to boycott first day of Chhattisgarh Assembly session: LoP Mahant
content: I have made a decision. I am telling my colleagues in front of you that we are completely boycotting the Assembly session on December 14, says Senior Congress leader Charandas Mahant

content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and C. Kumarappan dismiss a writ petition filed by the school against the government‚Äôs refusal to part with the public property

title: A.P. govt. mandates two e-waste collection drives every month
content: ULBs must hold e-waste collection drives on 10th and 20th of every month, supported by designated collection points, strict record-keeping and a dedicated Nodal Officer, says SOP

title: Trial court concludes that prosecution failed to prove charges against actor Dileep in 2017 actor rape case
content: The prosecution‚Äôs case was that the actor conspired with the accused to take revenge against the woman actor for defaming him and wrecking his marital life.

content: The Indian side emphasised on the need for early resolution of outstanding issues pertaining to export control, MEA said in a statement.

title: All three political fronts expect improved showing in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation
content: While LDF appears confident of winning more than the 51 wards that the front won last time, UDF is vying to increase its tally from just 10 out of the 100 wards. For BJP, realising the decade-long push for power in the Corporation tops its agenda

title: Issue stamp commemorating centenary of Mahatma Gandhi and Sree Narayana Guru‚Äôs meeting: K.C. Venugopal
content: During Zero Hour in the Lok Sabha, K.C. Venugopal called on the government to release a commemorative coin and postage stamp to mark the centenary of the 1925 meeting

title: Thirupparankundram row: No evidence to establish stone pillar is a deepathoon, says T.N. govt.
content: Advocate General P.S. Raman, representing the State, referred to the previous judgments in connection to the issue. He pointed out there was no mention of the deepathoon in the orders on the suit filed in 1920 demarcating the portions belonging to the temple and the dargah

content: There was no official announcement on the amended legislation; the Bill is likely to increase the guaranteed employment up to 100 days to 125 days, and introduce tweaks for better utilisation of funds, especially in economically weaker States

title: Kozhikode Corporation Council bids farewell as term nears end
content: The current council will stay in office until the new one takes charge, possibly before December 20; Mayor Beena Philip highlighted the council‚Äôs achievements over five years, while opposition councillors voiced regret over projects that had stalled

title: India expresses concern after Thailand-Cambodia fighting¬†damaged Preah Vihear complex
content: Preah Vihear temple complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, comprises temples dedicated to Lord Shiva dating back to the 11th century; Archaeological Survey of India has been part of conservation and restoration work on the ancient Khmer temples in Cambodia since 1986

title: Cover doctors deputed for COVID-19 duty under PMGKY: Supreme Court
content: Supreme Court judgment affirms requisition of doctors and health workers during COVID-19 for PMGKY insurance claims

title: Court calls for fair reporting of court proceedings
content: When the court convened on Friday to decide on the quantum of punishment for the convicts in the 2017 actor rape case, an exasperated Honey M. Varghese, the Principal Sessions Judge, suggested fair reporting of court proceedings and balanced comments without slandering the judicial system

title: CPI(M) unleashing violence out of fear of defeat, says KPCC president Sunny Joseph
content: CPI(M) workers targeted United Democratic Front (UDF) candidates and booth agents on the polling day and afterwards, with even women candidates getting brutally assaulted, alleges KPCC president

title: Watch: Novo Nordisk brings Ozempic to India for type 2 diabetes treatment
content: Danish pharma major Novo Nordisk on December 12, launched its blockbuster type 2 diabetes treatment injection Ozempic, globally popular for its weight-loss benefits. Ozempic is now available in India as 0.25 mg, 0.5 mg and 1 mg in ‚ÄòFlexTouch Pen‚Äô - an easy-to-use, once-weekly pen device.

title: CBI arrests six involved in transnational cybercrime
content: The accused persons had manipulated people in the U.S. into transferring $8.5 million to cryptocurrency wallets and foreign bank accounts

title: High vector indices signal dengue alarm in Thiruvananthapuram district
content: Rise in mosquito density is a clear indication that dengue cases can spike any time, say senior Health officials

title: Rajya Sabha resolution seeks free, compulsory early childhood care
content: Sudha Murty urges constitutional amendment for early childhood care and education through strengthened Anganwadi services

The petition also flags ‚Äòchronic and severe under-reporting‚Äô of cases and promotion of misinformation such as ‚Äòcow urine as cancer cure‚Äô.

content: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza captured the Maxwell Award as the nation's player of the year and the Davey O'Brien Award as top quarterback Friday night.

title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
content: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Moore facing charges of stalking, home invasion
content: Sherrone Moore, abruptly fired this week as Michigan football coach, was charged Friday with three crimes including home invasion and stalking a person he had dated, prosecutors said.

title: SGA: Thunder 'absolutely' want NBA wins record
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander says the Thunder are after every trophy or record they can obtain, including the NBA's record of 73 wins.

title: Utes' Whittingham stepping down after 21 years
content: Utah coach Kyle Whittingham announced he is stepping down after the team's Dec. 31 bowl game. Whittingham is the Utes' all-time leader in coaching wins with 177.

title: Canucks trade Hughes to Wild for 3 players, pick
content: Canucks captain Quinn Hughes was traded to the Wild for defenseman Zeev Buium, center Marco Rossi, winger Liam Ohgren and a first-round pick on Friday.

title: FIFA hails 5M WC ticket requests amid backlash
content: FIFA said Friday that it had received five million ticket requests in the first 24 hours of the third phase of ticket sales for the 2026 World Cup, despite widespread backlash from supporter groups to the prices being charged.

title: Wemby ready to return Sat. on limited minutes
content: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama, who is expected to return on a minutes restriction Saturday after missing 12 games, said he wanted to come back much sooner but had to "trust the process."

content: The Buffalo Bills quarterback and the "Sinners" star got married in May and are expecting their first baby together.

content: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

content: Before John Cena's final match, take a look back at his legendary career through the lens of his iconic shirts.

content: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

content: For years, Alan Shearer's all-time record of 260 Premier League goals looked like it would never be broken.

content: Find out when every SEC game will be, including Lane Kiffin's return to Oxford and Georgia's trip to Alabama.

content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

content: With the upcoming schedule, don't be surprised if Brock Purdy and Chase Brown are difference-makers down the stretch.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern plan on meeting to sign Gu√©hi
content: Bayern Munich are looking to take the initiative to try and sign Crystal Palace's Marc Gu√©hi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Delhi battles heavy smog: Airport issues advisory; passengers told to contact airlines
content: Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport is operating normally despite heavy smog and poor visibility, with low visibility procedures in effect. Air quality in the capital has plunged to 'very poor' levels, with dense fog expected to persist. Residents are advised to limit outdoor activities as the city faces another challenging winter smog episode.

title: ‚ÄòMohabbat hai‚Äô: Messi mania grips Kolkata; couple cancel honeymoon to see football icon
content: A newlywed couple postponed their honeymoon to witness Lionel Messi's arrival in Kolkata, highlighting the immense excitement for his GOAT India Tour 2025. Thousands of fans braved the cold, lining up outside Salt Lake Stadium to greet the football superstar, who arrived early Saturday morning amidst tight security.

title: ‚ÄòStaff tried saving equipment, dancer, not guests‚Äô: Goa fire survivor
content: A sole survivor of a Goa club fire, Bhawana Joshi, has alleged grave negligence by the club and authorities. She claims staff prioritized equipment over people, a door was jammed, and the fire brigade was delayed. Joshi also cited past incidents of mistreatment and overcrowding at the venue.

title: 'I don't pay attention': Vaibhav Suryavanshi on surpassing Virat Kohli | U19 Asia Cup
content: India's 14-year-old cricket sensation, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, has become the nation's most searched personality on Google, even surpassing Virat Kohli. His remarkable 171 off 95 balls in the U19 Asia Cup propelled him to global fame. Despite the immense attention, Suryavanshi remains grounded, focusing solely on his game and taking the newfound popularity in stride.

title: Intel may again face 'Chinese problem', and tough one
content: Intel is reportedly testing chipmaking equipment from ACM Research, a US firm with units previously targeted by US sanctions over alleged ties to China's military. This move, involving tools for Intel's critical 14A process, raises national security questions, especially as Intel is partially US government-owned. ACM denies wrongdoing, stating its US operations are separate.

title: Kerala: NDA and LDF neck-and-neck in Thiruvananthapuram corporation polls - live updates
content: Vote counting for Kerala's 1,199 local bodies commenced with postal ballots, followed by EVMs. Initial trends showed the ruling LDF, opposition UDF, and NDA leading across various local government tiers. The results are crucial for shaping strategies ahead of the 2026 Assembly elections.

title: Lionel Messi India tour: Full itinerary, cities, venues and key events
content: Football legend Lionel Messi's arrival in India for the GOAT India Tour 2025 has ignited unprecedented fan fervor. Thousands greeted him, showcasing immense popularity. The tour includes fan engagements, football events, and high-profile meetings across Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Delhi, culminating in a meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Epstein cache surfaces with 19 fresh photos: Trump, Clinton, Bill Gates appear in new images
content: House Oversight Committee Democrats released 19 photos from Jeffrey Epstein's estate, showing interactions with figures like Donald Trump, Bill Clinton, and Bill Gates. The images, part of a larger cache, offer glimpses into these associations. Republicans criticized the selective release, calling it a political tactic against Trump, while Democrats demand further transparency.

title: Apple‚Äôs latest update: iOS 26.2 adds customization tools; patches major bugs
content: Apple's latest iOS 26.2 update brings a customizable Liquid Glass look, offline lyrics for Apple Music, and crucial security patches. Users can now adjust lock screen clock transparency, enjoy lyrics without an internet connection, and benefit from enhanced safety alerts. Gamers and Podcasts app users also receive significant improvements, making this a must-install update.

title: Zubeen Garg death probe: Manager, organiser among 4 charged
content: In a significant development, Assam Police's Special Investigation Team has submitted a detailed chargesheet concerning the Zubeen Garg case within a swift timeframe of three months. Among the seven individuals implicated, four are facing serious murder charges, while the remaining are being accused of culpable homicide and associated offenses.

title: Messi in Kolkata: Thousands turn out to welcome Argentine icon - See pics
content: Lionel Messi's 'GOAT India Tour 2025' kicked off in Kolkata with thousands braving the cold for a midnight welcome. Despite tight security, fans experienced 'Messi mania' as the football icon arrived for a whirlwind tour across four cities, meeting dignitaries and participating in events.

title: When Vinod Khanna‚Äôs second wife called him ‚Äòvery taxing‚Äô to live with
content: Vinod Khanna's career took an unexpected turn when he left films for spiritual pursuits with Osho. This period significantly impacted his personal life, leading to his first divorce. After returning, Khanna remarried and found balance. He also built a political career, serving as a Member of Parliament. Khanna continued to deliver memorable performances in his later films before his passing.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
content: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, offering "mobility with dignity" as climate impacts worsen. This initiative marks a significant step in addressing climate-induced displacement.

title: 'India is a key partner': US lawmakers urge to scrap 50% tariff; warn of economic fallout
content: US lawmakers are pushing to remove steep tariffs on Indian imports, arguing they harm American jobs and consumers. A resolution seeks to end President Trump's national emergency declaration that led to duties up to 50%. This bipartisan move aims to mend the vital US-India partnership and boost economic ties, citing disruptions and increased costs for Americans.

title: Delhi AQI: Heavy smog blankets city; air quality edges towards ‚Äòsevere' zone
content: Delhi's air quality plummeted to 'very poor' on Saturday, with the AQI reaching 387 and nearing the 'severe' category. Low wind speeds are trapping pollutants, primarily from transport and industrial emissions, with neighboring NCR districts also contributing. Moderate fog is expected to persist, exacerbating health concerns as authorities advise limiting outdoor activities.

title: Cambodia accuses Thailand of fresh air strikes hours after Trump‚Äôs ceasefire claim
content: Cambodia accused Thailand of continued air strikes on Saturday, contradicting US President Donald Trump's claim of a ceasefire agreement. Trump stated both nations agreed to halt hostilities along their disputed border, following recent clashes that killed at least 20. Thailand's Prime Minister, however, indicated he asked Trump to press Cambodia for a ceasefire and troop withdrawal.

title: Who Is Sherrone Moore‚Äôs Wife Kell Moore? Ex-Michigan HC‚Äôs Family and Kids
content: University of Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore has been fired after allegations of an inappropriate relationship with a staff member. Athletic Director Warde Manuel confirmed the decision, citing a violation of university policy. Moore's wife, Kelli, and their three daughters are now under public scrutiny as the family navigates this unexpected controversy.

title: John Cena shocks WWE officials with emotional off-script moment on live Netflix broadcast
content: Wrestling icon John Cena surprised WWE officials and fans by going off-script during a Netflix broadcast, presenting a handwritten tribute to rival AJ Styles. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.

title: Johnson & Johnson ordered to pay $40 million in baby powder cancer case
content: A California jury ordered Johnson & Johnson to pay $40 million to two women who claimed its talc-based baby powder caused their ovarian cancer. The women testified that decades of use led to major surgeries and chemotherapy. Johnson & Johnson plans to appeal, stating the verdict is aberrant and lacks evidence.

title: In terror acts, rights of accused subservient to national interest: Supreme Court
content: The Supreme Court has ruled that individual liberty, while crucial, cannot override national security concerns in UAPA cases.  Upholding this, the court denied bail to accused in the Jnaneshwari Express derailment case, emphasizing that barbaric acts endangering national integrity are not excusable, even after prolonged incarceration.  The apex court stressed the need for expeditious trials in such grave matters.

title: 'Dhurandhar' Day 8: Ranveer‚ÄìAkshaye starrer earns Rs 30 cr, weekend total hits Rs 250 cr
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is making waves, crossing the Rs 250 crore mark and eyeing historical box office records. The spy thriller's second Friday collections surged, surpassing its opening day and showing immense growth. With strong word-of-mouth, the film is poised for a massive second weekend, potentially outperforming major hits and setting new benchmarks for Ranveer Singh's career.

title: Expired license, missing approvals: How Luthra brothers ran Goa nightclub illegally
content: A Goa nightclub operated illegally for 18 months without essential permissions and an expired licence, leading to a devastating fire that killed 25. Despite clear violations and a lack of safety measures, authorities failed to act until the tragedy. Owners knowingly risked patrons' lives by operating without mandatory clearances.

title: AI Express eyes IndiGo pilots, its own aviators up in arms
content: Air India Express pilots are protesting the recruitment of new A320 captains, fearing reduced flying hours and pay.  Around 100 pilots have written to management, questioning external hiring when internal utilization is low. They worry this will further impact their ability to meet contracted flying hours and affect their overall compensation.

title: Usain Bolt & Kasi Bennett net worth 2025: Career, family, business
content: Sprint legend Usain Bolt, estimated at $90 million net worth in 2025, continues to thrive post-retirement through endorsements and business ventures. His partner, Kasi Bennett, a model and entrepreneur, supports his endeavors while maintaining a private life. Together, they focus on their three children, balancing global success with family values.

title: Paige Shiver net worth: 55% salary hike and Sherrone Moore link spark buzz
content: University of Michigan football is in turmoil as executive assistant Paige Shiver faces intense public scrutiny. Her name is linked to former coach Sherrone Moore's firing and police detainment due to alleged inappropriate relationship rumors. Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: Cold night, dark lane, fatal attack: JEE aspirant stabbed to death in Delhi; youth dreamt of being engineer
content: An 18-year-old JEE aspirant was fatally stabbed during a robbery attempt in Delhi after he resisted giving up his phone. The incident occurred on a poorly lit shortcut, highlighting safety concerns in the area. Police have arrested four individuals, including minors, who admitted to the crime to fund their drug addiction.

title: Megan Thee Stallion‚ÄìKlay Thompson cheating rumor explodes amid breakup buzz
content: Social media erupted with breakup rumors about Megan Thee Stallion and Klay Thompson. A single X post alleged cheating and a split. The internet quickly spread the claim, despite a complete lack of proof. No credible news outlets or official statements have confirmed the story. This highlights how quickly unverified information can trend online.

title: Cabinet clears SHANTI bill to open nuclear power to pvt sector
content: The Union Cabinet has greenlit a bill to open India's nuclear power sector to private players, a move crucial for achieving 100 GW nuclear capacity by 2047. The SHANTI Bill proposes changes to civil liability laws, caps supplier liability, and allows up to 49% foreign direct investment. This aims to boost domestic energy production and meet net-zero targets.

title: Rs 12k cr for 2-phase census, will allow self-enumeration
content: India gears up for Census 2027 with a Rs 11,718 crore budget, marking the first digital enumeration and inclusion of a caste count. The two-phase exercise, starting April 2026, will utilize mobile apps for data collection. Reference date is March 1, 2027, with special provisions for snow-bound regions. This census aims to provide accurate population data for future development planning.

title: Karur stampede case: Something going wrong in Madras HC, says SC
content: The Supreme Court expressed strong disapproval of the Madras High Court's handling of the Karur stampede case, stating "something is going wrong in the HC." The apex court rejected the Tamil Nadu government's plea to let its own commission investigate the incident, emphasizing the need for a fair and impartial inquiry. The SC will examine the HC registrar general's report.

title: Rupee at historic low: How 9% real depreciation could reshape India‚Äôs economy - explained
content: The Indian rupee is experiencing a significant decline against the US dollar, which could impact inflation, exports, and corporate margins. While short-term effects are challenging, a weaker rupee could boost long-term growth by encouraging domestic production and improving export competitiveness. Experts anticipate this trend may continue due to trade deal uncertainties and capital flow pressures.

title: NBA stars whose celebrity partners turned heads on and off the court
content: Love stories between NBA stars and established celebrities have often stolen the spotlight, blending sports and entertainment. From Khloe Kardashian's dramatic romance with Tristan Thompson to Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union's powerful advocacy, these high-profile unions captivated fans.  Other notable pairings include Teyana Taylor and Iman Shumpert, Amelia Vega and Al Horford, and La La and Carmelo Anthony.

title: Govt approves 125-day rural job bill to replace MGNREGA
content: The government has approved a bill to replace MGNREGA with the Pujya Bapu Gramin Rozgar Guarantee Bill, promising 125 workdays per household. This move aims to counter opposition criticism on funding and boost employment claims, particularly in rural areas. Projects will align with Viksit Bharat National Infra Stack, prioritizing water security.

title: Savarkar never got due recognition: Amit Shah
content: Home Minister Amit Shah lauded Vinayak Damodar Savarkar's fight against untouchability and social evils, stating he never received due recognition. Unveiling a statue, RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat honored the ideologue's enduring legacy. Shah highlighted Savarkar's patriotism, reformist zeal, and literary contributions, emphasizing his resilience during imprisonment and unwavering belief in India's freedom.

title: Rahul Gandhi asks for air pollution debate in Lok Sabha, govt agrees
content: Rahul Gandhi has demanded a Lok Sabha debate on the severe air pollution plaguing Indian cities, urging the government to present a concrete plan. Meanwhile, Delhi's air quality remains 'very poor' and is predicted to turn 'severe' by Sunday, with light winds failing to disperse pollutants. Moderate fog is also expected.

title: J&K: LG hands appointment letters to kin of Nowgam police station blast victims
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha met families of those killed in the Nowgam police station blast, providing them with appointment letters on compassionate grounds. He lauded the J&K Police for dismantling a terror network, emphasizing national support for the affected families. The blast, described as accidental, occurred during the examination of seized explosives.

title: Ahead of PM Modi's 3-nation tour, FTA with Oman gets Cabinet nod
content: Prime Minister Modi's upcoming visit to Oman is poised to forge a robust economic and strategic alliance, potentially including a free trade agreement and a joint defense partnership. India anticipates receiving spare parts for its retired Jaguar fleet from Oman.

title: Congress MP claims BJP neta was drunk during Rahul Gandhi's speech
content: A Congress MP has accused a senior BJP member of attending Lok Sabha proceedings "drunk" during Rahul Gandhi's speech on electoral reforms.  The MP cited the individual's "repeated gestures" and "tottering" as evidence, urging the BJP to prevent such incidents. This allegation follows a recent row over a TMC MP allegedly "vaping" in the House, highlighting concerns over parliamentary decorum.

title: Triple H & Stephanie McMahon Net Worth 2025: WWE careers and business
content: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. Their leadership in talent development, branding, and strategic expansion has built a strong financial foundation and continues to shape WWE's future identity and growth under TKO.

title: 3 Indian-Origin Men Arrested After Shootout Over Canada Truckers' Rivalry
content: Three Indian-origin truck drivers have been arrested after a shootout between two rival tow-truck groups in Canada. The search is still on for another suspect, said Peel Regional Police, sharing a video of the shootout in Brampton.

title: SBI Loans To Be Cheaper As It Passes RBI Rate Cut Benefit To Borrowers
content: The country's largest lender State Bank of India (SBI) has reduced its lending rate by 25 basis points, following the Reserve Bank's policy rate cut, making loans cheaper for existing and new borrowers.

title: Bill Gates, Ex-Prince Andrew Seen In New Pics From Epstein's Estate
content: The photo release included images of the right-wing political operative Steve Bannon, billionaires Richard Branson and Bill Gates, filmmaker Woody Allen, former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers and law professor Alan Dershowitz.

title: 'Unsecured Lending Means...': Nithin Kamath Explains Why Zerodha Stays Out
content: The brokerage is doubling down on Loan Against Securities (LAS)a low-risk, asset-backed model aligned with its investor base.

title: "India Important Partner": US Lawmakers Move Resolution To End Trump Tariffs
content: Three members of the US House of Representatives on Friday introduced a resolution aimed at terminating President Donald Trump's national emergency declaration that imposed tariffs of up to 50 per cent on imports from India.

title: On Camera, Australian Politician's Pet Dog Welcomes Bull, Horse Into Home
content: A lawmaker in Australia was left in udder disbelief when he came home to discover his pet dog had let a bull and a horse into his living room. Andrew Mackay, a Northern Territory politician, shared the evidence from his pet cam on social media.

title: IndiGo Will Pay Over Rs 500 Crore To Customers Who Were "Severely Stranded"
content: IndiGo said on Friday that it has estimated the compensation amount will exceed Rs 500 crore for customers whose flights were cancelled within 24 hours of departure and who were left severely stranded at certain airports across the country.

title: Heavy Smog Grips Delhi As Air Quality Nears 'Severe,' Airport Issues Advisory
content: Residents of Delhi woke up to smog on Saturday, with the air quality nearing the 'severe' category. According to data from the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB), the Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 390, which falls under the "very poor" categor

title: PMK Leader's Visit To Vijay-Led TVK's Headquarters Sparks Alliance Buzz
content: K Balu said the purpose was his visit was to invite the TVK to participate in their December 17 protest in Chennai, demanding a caste-based survey in the state.

title: Thane Man Steals Rs 2.23 Lakh From Employer, Tries To Stage It As Robbery
content: Sushant Dashrath Mohite claimed that two men in khaki uniform stopped him, checked his vehicle documents and forcibly took Rs 2.23 lakh.

title: P Chidambaram Slams Karnataka Home Minister's Bulldozer Remark
content: G Parameshwara had said the state government was considering "razing down" the homes of the drug peddlers.

title: Iran Seizes Oil Tanker Carrying Illegal Fuel, Indians Among 18 Crew Members
content: Iran has seized an oil tanker in the Gulf of Oman, Iranian media said overnight Friday to Saturday, adding that 18 crew members from India, Sri Lanka and Bangladesh were on board.

title: After Settlement, Court Quashes FIR Against Hospital In Cotton Mop Case
content: The Delhi High Court has quashed an FIR registered against a private hospital and one of its senior doctors after noting that the medical negligence dispute had been "amicably resolved" between the parties.

title: UN Expert Warns Pakistan Over Imran Khan's Detention Conditions Amid Political Turmoil
content: Imran Khan's detention has become a focal point of Pakistan's deep political divisions following his removal from office in April 2022 and the subsequent crackdown on his Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) party.

title: Trump Diverted Billions In Military Funds To Support Immigration: Report
content: The Trump administration diverted more than $2 billion from US military funds in 2025 to support immigration enforcement operations, weakening military readiness and straining servicemembers, according to a report released by Democratic lawmakers.

title: Ukraine To Join EU By 2027 Under US Plan To End War With Russia: Report
content: Washington has the leverage needed to convince leaders opposed to Ukraine's membership to change their stance, Zelensky told journalists on Thursday.

title: US Forces Raided Ship Headed To Iran From China In Indian Ocean: Report
content: A US special operations team in the Indian Ocean raided a ship headed to Iran from China last month and seized military-related articles, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing US officials.

title: Did Pak PM Gatecrash Putin's Closed-Door Meeting? A Fact Check
content: Shehbaz Sharif met Vladimir Putin and Recep Tayyip Erdogan on the sidelines of the International Forum dedicated to the International Year of Peace and Trust in Turkmenistan.

title: Delhi Notifies New Legislation To Regulate Fees In Private Schools
content: The Delhi government has notified the Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fee) Act, 2025, bringing into effect a new framework for regulating fees in private schools.

title: Power Rankings: The 4-team race for No. 1
content: four teams had a legitimate case to be no. 1 in this week's Power Rankings . Michigan took the top spot thanks to the Wolverines' dominance at the Players Era Festival in Las Vegas . Arizona was our No. 1 team heading into Feast Week after the Wildcats knocked off UConn .

title: Five players who offer upside for your lineup in Week 15
content: fantasy managers should consider starting Jauan Jennings in Week 15 . the playoffs already rolling in ESPN standard leagues and plenty of formats kicking off their tournaments this week . think big-play chops here and favorable deployment based on the week 15 slate of games .

title: Men's class rankings: USC into top 10; Tennessee and Texas A&M join
content: the biggest winner of this most recent update was USC . both of their signees made enormous leaps in the player rankings . the Trojans jumped from no. 24 all the way to no. 9 despite not adding any commitments .

title: As responsibilities evolve, MLB manager salaries still lag behind top coaches in other sports
content: Pat Murphy and Stephen Vogt both won manager of the year for the first time in 2024 . the two became just the second managers in each league to win the award in back-to-back seasons . this year, they became the first managers in a row to receive the award .

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: Encore, Aspinall! Encore, Topuria! Five UFC rematches to look for in 2026
content: two of the first three numbered events in 2026 will feature rematches in the main event . if Brandon Royval wins, it could lead to a no contest in the heavyweight title fight . the men's bantamweight championship is set for 2026 . click here for all the latest news .

title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks MVP candidates, picks winner

title: 56 ex-judges throw weight behind Madras HC judge
content: former judges issued open letter urging members of parliament to withdraw impeachment notice against him . they warned the move undermines judicial independence and seeks to pressure judges who do not align with certain political or ideological expectations . the notice was filed after justice G R Swaminathan directed state authorities to ensure that a sacred lamp be lit at a hilltop temple .

title: NHL trade grades: Report cards for Hughes, Jarry deals
content: the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick . Throughout the season up until the March 6 deadline, ESPN reporters will be grading each side on all of the big swaps .

title: Notable bowl game mascots, from Tony the Tiger to Pop-Tarts
content: mascots have elevated end-of-season games into social media and pop culture spectacles . nine of the past 12 games have featured a team from a military academy . it's the seventh-oldest college bowl game in the country .

title: We made score picks for every postseason college football game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: Consider bringing back Sunali's husband, 3 others from Bangladesh: SC
content: 'Examine On Humanitarian Grounds' asked the union govt to consider on humanitarian grounds the pleas for bringing back four others, including her husband, who were deported to Bangladesh in June this year . a bench of cJI Surya Kant and justices Joymalya Bagchi and Vipul M Pancholi informed the bench that she is back in India and residing with her father .

title: DGCA removes 4 officials overseeing IndiGo ops
content: four flight operations inspectors (FOIs) have been sent back to the DGCA . the four were the principal operations inspector for oversight on IndiGo . they are supposed to keep a close watch on the airline's requirements and also see if they have the required resources in terms of crew .

title: Can check airfares but deregulation must for growth: Naidu
content: civil aviation minister says govt retains the power to intervene in extraordinary circumstances to protect passengers against opportunistic pricing . he says the growth in airfare is actually negative if consumer price index is factored in . in india, it has fallen by 43% compared to 23% in the us and 34% in china .
